title: Ticket #3299: Missing $ENV(VAR) on submission causes EXCEPT
description:
In a submission if you have 
getenv= $ENV(DEBUG) =?= TRUE

causes submission to except. After chatting with several folks we believe the proper behavior is to return UNDEFINED.
remarks:
2012-Dec-11 16:40:34 by johnkn:
Bulk change of target version from v070902 to v070903 using ./ticket-target-mover.

2013-Jul-09 10:13:54 by jfrey:
Code Review

This change looks ok.
